create(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a dataItem with the provided, complete, path.

Returns: true if the asset exists in this data item.

createWithAutoAppendedId(java.lang.Strin.Description: Creates a @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#PutDataRequest_E@ with a randomly generated id prefixed with the provided path.

getData().Description: An array of data stored at the specfied @B_android#net#Uri_E@. @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#PutDataMapRequest_E@ may be used to store structured data in the network.

setData(byte[]).Description: Sets the data in a data item.

Returns: unmodifiable map of assets on this dataItem.

getUri().Description: Returns a @B_android#net#Uri_E@ for the pending data item. If this is a modification of an existing data item, @B_android#net#Uri#getHost_E@ will return the id of the node that originally created it. Otherwise, a new data item will be created with the requesting device's node.

getAsset(java.lang.String).Description: Returns an asset previously added with @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#PutDataRequest#putAsset_E@.
